titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on alkylated amino resin solution, formaldehyde.
To suspend temporarily the duty on alkylated amino resin solution, formaldehyde.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on alkylated amino resin solution, formaldehyde.
